summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5887 for the improvement of 10th Avenue South, from Atlantic Street to Beacon Avenue; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by constructing a watermain 4 inches in diameter, and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 77584, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
